data.title: Template Populating
data.statement: The goal is to populate given [[template]] with given user data. Template contains placeholders, each in the format {{<key>}}, key contains only letters. User data are key-value pairs. Matching is case sensitive. The input contains no dangling {{<}} or {{>}}. If the template placeholder contains an unprovided key, remove that placeholder from the template. A key may be unused or used more than once.

testCases.title: E-mail
testCases.testIn:
2
name John Smith
excessAmount 21
Dear <name>, you exceeded limit by <excessAmount>MB.
testCases.testOut: Dear John Smith, you exceeded limit by 21MB.

testCases.title: Validator 2
testCases.testIn:
2
name Jane Doe
excessAmount 90
Dear <name>, you exceeded limit by <excessAmount>GB.
testCases.testOut: Dear Jane Doe, you exceeded limit by 90GB.

testCases.title: Redundant, Missing
testCases.testIn:
5
fullName John Smith
firstName John
surname Smith
title Mr.
sex male
Name: <surname>, <firstName> aka "<alias>".

testCases.title: Validator 3
testCases.testIn:
5
fullName John Smith
firstName John
surname Smith
title Mr.
sex male
User: <surname>; <firstName> aka "<alias>".

testCases.title: Case Sensitivity
testCases.testIn:
4
animal dog
Animal Dog
activity running
Activity Running
What's the <animal> doing? <Activity>. The <animal> is currently <activity>.
testCases.testOut: What's the dog doing? Running. The dog is currently running.

testCases.title: Validator 4
testCases.testIn:
4
animal cat
Animal Cat
activity swimming
Activity Swimming
What's the <animal> doing? <Activity>. The <animal> is <activity>.
testCases.testOut: What's the cat doing? Swimming. The cat is swimming.

testCases.title: Many Replacements
testCases.testIn:
7
a 153
b 10.59
c -32
id 1002354
message Unexpected exception
errorCode 500
errorDetail Malformed input at line 520.
Incident <id>: The request with input data [<a>,<b>,<c>] failed with code <errorCode>. Message is "<message>" and the details are: "<errorDetail>". Follow http://url.com?detail=<id>
testCases.testOut: Incident 1002354: The request with input data [153,10.59,-32] failed with code 500. Message is "Unexpected exception" and the details are: "Malformed input at line 520.". Follow http://url.com?detail=1002354

testCases.title: Validator 5
testCases.testIn:
7
a 113
b 11.59
c -12
id 1002354
message Unexpected exception
errorCode 500
errorDetail Malformed input at line 520.
Incident <id>: The request with input data [<a>;<b>;<c>] failed with code <errorCode>. Message is "<message>" and the details are: "<errorDetail>". Follow http://url.com?detail=<id>
testCases.testOut: Incident 1002354: The request with input data [113;11.59;-12] failed with code 500. Message is "Unexpected exception" and the details are: "Malformed input at line 520.". Follow http://url.com?detail=1002354

testCases.title: Two Not Keys
testCases.testIn:
1
info two not keys
First <NotKey>, second <AnotherNotKey>.

data.constraints:
1 <= [[n]] <= 20
key-value [[pair]] does not contain placeholder separator characters {{<}}, {{>}}, key contains only letters (no spaces)
data.stubGenerator:
read n:int
loop n read pair:string(1000)
read template:string(1000)
write populated template
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> An integer [[n]] for the number of key-value pairs with the user data.
<<Next [[n]] lines:>> A key-value [[pair]] separated by space (key cannot contain spaces, but value can), e.g. `name John Smith`.
<<Next line:>> [[template]] to be populated.
data.outputDescription: <<Line 1:>> Template populated with the user data.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

The goal is to populate given template with given user data. Template contains placeholders, each in the format <key>, key contains only letters. User data are key-value pairs. Matching is case sensitive. The input contains no dangling < or >. If the template placeholder contains an unprovided key, remove that placeholder from the template. A key may be unused or used more than once.
Input
Line 1: An integer n for the number of key-value pairs with the user data.
Next n lines: A key-value pair separated by space (key cannot contain spaces, but value can), e.g. 
name John Smith
.
Next line: template to be populated.
Output
Line 1: Template populated with the user data.
Constraints
1 <= n <= 20
key-value pair does not contain placeholder separator characters <, >, key contains only letters (no spaces)
Example
Input
1
user jsmith123
'<user>' logged in.
Output
'jsmith123' logged in.
